findings.title: Naming collision
findings.description: There is a naming collision between the function `isHuman()` in `Oracle.sol` and the modifier with the same name.

findings.title: Tautologies in timing range check
findings.description: The functions setPrice() and getPrice() in Oracle.sol contain a superfluous range check for the time slot parameter _timeslot, which is an unsigned integer and cannot be negative.

findings.title: Use of int256 for prices in Oracle.sol
findings.description: Prices are stored as `int256` which is unnecessary and introduces range checks, whereas unsigned integers are used to express prices in other contracts.

findings.title: Oracle.sol: Unused member variable: ownership
findings.description: Member variable `ownership` is not being used anywhere inside the Oracle contract.
